title: De Maria Scotorum Regina totáque eius contra Regem coniuratione, fœdo cum Bothuelio adulterio, nefaria in maritum crudelitate & rabie, horrendo insuper & deterrimo eiusdem parricidio: plena & tragica planè historia.
author: Buchanan, George, 1506-1582.
notes: P. 1-30 are by George Buchanan. "Actio contra Mariam Scotorum Reginam", p. 31-100, is attributed to Thomas Wilson, as is the translation of "Literæ Reginæ Scot. ad comitem Bothuelium scriptæ", p. 101-121.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
